citation: Proclamation under the Justice and Related Legislation (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2012 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Justice and Related Legislation (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2012

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2(2) of the Justice and Related Legislation (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2012 fix 1 December 2012 as the day on which Part 21 of that Act commences.

19 November 2012

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRIAN WIGHTMAN

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 November 2012

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
